sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/Card'; import { Button } from './ui/Button'; import { Award, Download, Eye, Calendar, CheckCircle, Clock, Star } from 'lucide-react'; const CertificatePage = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('obtained'); // 模拟证书数据 const certificatesData = { obtained: [ { id: 1, name: 'React 开发专家认证', issuer: '前端技术学院', issueDate: '2024-01-10', expiryDate: '2026-01-10', level: 'expert', score: 95, credentialId: 'REACT-2024-001', skills: ['React Hooks', '状态管理', '组件设计', '性能优化'], status: 'active' }, { id: 2, name: 'JavaScript 高级开发者', issuer: 'Web开发协会', issueDate: '2023-11-15', expiryDate: '2025-11-15', level: 'advanced', score: 88, credentialId: 'JS-2023-156', skills: ['ES6+', '异步编程', '模块化', '测试'], status: 'active' }, { id: 3, name: 'CSS 样式设计师', issuer: 'UI设计学院', issueDate: '2023-09-20', expiryDate: '2024-09-20', level: 'intermediate', score: 82, credentialId: 'CSS-2023-089', skills: ['Flexbox', 'Grid', '响应式设计', '动画'], status: 'expiring' } ], inProgress: [ { id: 4, name: 'Node.js 后端开发', issuer: '服务端技术学院', progress: 75, estimatedCompletion: '2024-02-28', requirements: [ { name: '完成课程学习', completed: true }, { name: '项目实战', completed: true }, { name: '期末考试', completed: false }, { name: '代码评审', completed: false } ] }, { id: 5, name: 'TypeScript 专业认证', issuer: '类型安全学院', progress: 45, estimatedCompletion: '2024-03-15', requirements: [ { name: '基础语法学习', completed: true }, { name: '高级特性', completed: false }, { name: '实际项目应用', completed: false }, { name: '认证考试', completed: false } ] } ], available: [ { id: 6, name: 'Vue.js 框架专家', issuer: '前端框架学院', difficulty: 'advanced', duration: '8周', prerequisites: ['JavaScript 高级开发者'], description: '深入学习Vue.js框架，包括组合式API、状态管理、路由等' }, { id: 7, name: '全栈开发工程师', issuer: '全栈技术学院', difficulty: 'expert', duration: '12周', prerequisites: ['React 开发专家认证', 'Node.js 后端开发'], description: '综合前后端技术，培养全栈开发能力' }, { id: 8, name: '移动端开发专家', issuer: '移动开发学院', difficulty: 'advanced', duration: '10周', prerequisites: ['React 开发专家认证'], description: '学习React Native和移动端开发最佳实践' } ] }; const getLevelColor = (level) => { switch (level) { case 'expert': return 'bg-purple-100 text-purple-800'; case 'advanced': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800'; case 'intermediate': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'beginner': return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const getDifficultyColor = (difficulty) => { switch (difficulty) { case 'expert': return 'text-purple-600'; case 'advanced': return 'text-blue-600'; case 'intermediate': return 'text-green-600'; case 'beginner': return 'text-gray-600'; default: return 'text-gray-600'; } }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'active': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'expiring': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; case 'expired': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; return (

证书中心

管理和查看您的学习证书

{/* 统计概览 */}

{certificatesData.obtained.length}

已获得证书

{certificatesData.inProgress.length}

进行中

{certificatesData.available.length}

可申请

1

即将过期
{/* 标签页导航 */}
{[ { id: 'obtained', label: '已获得证书', count: certificatesData.obtained.length }, { id: 'inProgress', label: '进行中', count: certificatesData.inProgress.length }, { id: 'available', label: '可申请', count: certificatesData.available.length } ].map((tab) => ( ))}
{/* 已获得证书 */} {activeTab === 'obtained' && (
{certificatesData.obtained.map((cert) => (

{cert.name}

{cert.issuer}

颁发日期

{cert.issueDate}

有效期至

{cert.expiryDate}

认证编号

{cert.credentialId}

考试成绩

{cert.score}分

{cert.level === 'expert' ? '专家级' : cert.level === 'advanced' ? '高级' : '中级'} {cert.status === 'active' ? '有效' : cert.status === 'expiring' ? '即将过期' : '已过期'}

技能标签

{cert.skills.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}
))}
)} {/* 进行中的证书 */} {activeTab === 'inProgress' && (
{certificatesData.inProgress.map((cert) => ( {cert.name}

{cert.issuer}
完成进度 {cert.progress}%

预计完成时间：{cert.estimatedCompletion}

完成要求

{cert.requirements.map((req, index) => (
{req.completed ? ( ) : (
)} {req.name}
))}
))}
)} {/* 可申请证书 */} {activeTab === 'available' && (
{certificatesData.available.map((cert) => (
{cert.name}
{cert.difficulty === 'expert' ? '专家级' : cert.difficulty === 'advanced' ? '高级' : '中级'}

{cert.issuer}

{cert.description}

学习周期

{cert.duration}

前置要求

{cert.prerequisites.map((prereq, index) => ( {prereq} ))}
))}
)}
); }; export default CertificatePage;
